Hello, \N[1]. Welcome to the Outpost of
Godrok Island. I was just in the tower, when I
saw you arriving in the boat. I'm glad you
I hope you like the gift that my son, Emantos,
made for you. Consider it a token of your
initiation onto to the team. Congratulations,
We, Shadow team, have a reward for your effort.
Please speak with my son, Emantos, if you have
not already. He has the reward. He actually
Now, as a member of Shadow team, it is time to
begin our primary mission. We must scout this
island and find the new chasm that has opened.
A chasm opens whenever the Hell Gate awakens.
The Hell Gate is in the Underworld, which
manifests under the surface of this island
whenever enough dark energy accumulates in the
We need to get to the Hell Gate, and we need
to close it. The Underworld shouldn't be
swarming with Demons as long as the other teams
remain alive on the other islands.
They'll keep the demons distracted out there.
Demons are attracted to human energy, so, as
long as everyone stays scattered, the demons
should stay scattered across the islands, too.
As we get closer to Hell's Gate, all the
demons will begin to enrage... This is when
the other teams MUST hold their ground... if
they fail, ALL the demons will swarm to us...
Let's pray this all goes to plan. Now get
ready, we are heading out to scout the island
for the chasm. Emantos's Soleth will keep a
watch and let us know when one of us finds it.
At that point, we will have to make sure to
remain distanced from each other. The
Underworld is hyper-reactive to human energy...
So, whoever finds the chasm, goes in alone.
Also, along the way, we may come across large
still dormant. If you see one, defeat it. If
they're allowed to grow, it'll be a problem...
We, Shadow team, have a reward for your effort.
Please speak with my son, Emantos, if you have
not already. He has the reward. He actually
Alright, guys. Let's get going. Move out. And
stay scattered so the demons don't gather!
Hello, \N[1]. Good to see you again.
How's the scouting going? Any finds? So far,
things have been clear out here. Just a few
demons, as expected, but no Archdemons luckily.
The demons around here are either the ones left
alive from our last hunt years ago, or they
are new ones beginning to manifest... which
could mean Hell's Gate fully opens in a year...
If any Archdemons are present though... then
the gate is already open... and the hunt
begins. But, from what we feel in the energy
in the air, the gate must not be fully opened.
